name: Psychic Escape
description:
You are a fugitive from a government experiment that has psychic powers. Try to escape the building by using your powers to move the pieces that don't have signal tapes. But be careful, the more you use your powers, the weaker you get!

CONTROLS

MOVE  ->  WSAD

INTERACT  -> MOUSE

I HOPE YOU ENJOY!

TEAM

DEVELOPMENT AND ART

Tsukyy

GAME DESIGN AND SOUND DESIGN

Haipou
